title: Listeners
synopsis: Set in a world where the concept of music ceases to exist. The story begins when a boy encounters Myuu, a mysterious girl who possesses an audio input jack in her body. The two intermingle with the history of rock music and embark on an unforgettable journey.
voices: ['Takahashi, Rie', 'Murase, Ayumu', 'Kugimiya, Rie', 'Tanaka, Atsuko', 'Fukuyama, Jun', 'Hanazawa, Kana', 'Cho', 'Kurosawa, Tomoyo', 'Satou, Rina', 'Nakamura, Yuuichi']
staff: [['Andou, Hiroaki', ['Director']], ['Koizumi, Kisuke', ['Sound Director']], ['Jin', ['Original Creator']], ['Satou, Dai', ['Series Composition', ' Original Creator']]]
